body_html:
Problem resolved!
The only python version that worked for me is:
Python: **3.5.2 |Anaconda 4.2.0 (64-bit)|** (default, Jul 5 2016, 11:41:13) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)]

My source code is here:
https://github.com/QuantScientist/Deep-Learning-Boot-Camp/blob/master/day02-PyTORCH-and-PyCUDA/PyTorch/01%20PyTorch%20GPU%20support%20test.ipynb

body:
Problem resolved!
The only python version that worked for me is:
```Python:  **3.5.2 |Anaconda 4.2.0 (64-bit)|** (default, Jul  5 2016, 11:41:13) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)]```

My source code is here:
https://github.com/QuantScientist/Deep-Learning-Boot-Camp/blob/master/day02-PyTORCH-and-PyCUDA/PyTorch/01%20PyTorch%20GPU%20support%20test.ipynb
